mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT C.CLASS_NO , C.CLASS_NAME , C.CLASS_TEACHER , C.STUDENT_MAXNO , C.CLASS_DETAIL , C.PRICE , CIMG.CLASS_IMG_PATH AS THUMBNAIL_IMG , TO_CHAR(C.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS "START_TIME" , TO_CHAR(C.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS "END_TIME" , TO_CHAR(C.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "ENROLL_DATE" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_REGIST CR WHERE CR.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO) AS CURRENT_STUDENT
FROM CLASS C JOIN CLASS_IMG CIMG ON C.CLASS_NO = CIMG.REF_CNO WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' AND CIMG.CLASS_IMG_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY C.START_DATE DESC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(REGIST_PERSON_NO), 0) FROM CLASS_REGIST WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT C.CLASS_NO , C.CLASS_NAME , C.CLASS_TEACHER , C.STUDENT_MAXNO , C.CLASS_DETAIL , C.PRICE , TO_CHAR(C.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS "START_TIME" , TO_CHAR(C.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS "END_TIME" , TO_CHAR(C.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "ENROLL_DATE" , CIMG.CLASS_IMG_PATH AS THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM CLASS C JOIN CLASS_IMG CIMG ON C.CLASS_NO = CIMG.REF_CNO WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{oneClassNo} AND C.STATUS = 'Y' AND CIMG.CLASS_IMG_TYPE = 1
SELECT * FROM CLASS_IMG WHERE REF_CNO = #{oneClassNo} AND STATUS='Y' AND CLASS_IMG_TYPE = 2

SELECT CR.CLASS_REVIEW_NO, CR.CLASS_REVIEW_CONTENT, CR.LIST_NO, M.MEM_NAME AS REVIEW_WRITER, C.CLASS_NAME, TO_CHAR(C.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "START_DATE" FROM CLASS_REVIEW CR JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEM_NO) JOIN CLASS_REGIST CREG ON CREG.REGIST_NO = CR.LIST_NO JOIN CLASS C ON CREG.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO WHERE CREG.CLASS_NO = #{oneClassNo}

SELECT REGIST_NO , REGIST_PAYCODE , REGIST_PRICE , REGIST_PERSON_NO , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "REGIST_DATE" , TO_CHAR(REGIST_CANCEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "REGIST_CANCEL_DATE" , STATUS , CLASS_NO , MEM_NO FROM CLASS_REGIST WHERE REGIST_NO = #{ocrno}
mapper.update: UPDATE CLASS_REGIST SET STATUS = 'N', REGIST_CANCEL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REGIST_NO = #{ocrno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS_REVIEW(CLASS_REVIEW_NO , CLASS_REVIEW_CONTENT , LIST_NO , MEM_NO) VALUES(SEQ_CLASS_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL , #{classReviewContent} , #{listNo} , #{reviewWriter})
